sentences.english: The above mentioned officials, who solve problems for both the country and the public, are excellent ones.
sentences.chinese: 上述为国为民排忧解难的官员就是优秀的。

sentences.english: Friends indeed can be friends in need after graduation.
sentences.chinese: 真正的朋友能够在你毕业后会为你排忧解难。

sentences.english: Establish record cards for clients, cl ients. carry out callback system inorder to duly resolve problems.
sentences.chinese: 设立用户记录卡，实行回访制度，及时排忧解难。

sentences.english: Voters judged Mr Romney most capable of easing their pain.
sentences.chinese: 选民们断定罗姆内先生最具实力为他们排忧解难。

sentences.english: In a word me the man-days with future hope system can can get typeset for people You untie disaster.
sentences.chinese: 总之，我希望未来的人工制能能多为人们排忧解难。

sentences.english: With good reputation this Housemaid Service Center is ready to do its best to solve your problems and allay your apprehensions.
sentences.chinese: 本保姆服务中心声誉良好，愿为您家庭排忧解难尽力。

to show sb how to get to the right path
to dispel doubts/to clear up confusion
wholeheartedly
to spare no effort (idiom); to do one's utmost
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
to express an opinion/to offer advice
enthusiasm/zeal/zealous/zest/enthusiastic/ardent/warmhearted

heart and soul/wholeheartedly
genuine and sincere (idiom)/wholehearted

to put oneself in sb else's shoes
warmhearted/willing to help others
